text: The Lancia Lybra is a car produced by Lancia. It replaced the Lancia Dedra in 1999 and was discontinued in 2005. It was replaced by the new Delta in 2008. == Engines == * 1.6 16V 76 kW (103 hp) * 1.8 16V 96 kW (130 hp) * 2.0 20V 110 kW (150 hp) and 113 kW (154 hp) * 1.9 JTD 77 kW (105 hp), 81 kW (110 hp) and 85 kW (115 hp) * 2.4 JTD 100 kW (136 hp), 103 kW (140 hp) and 110 kW (150 hp) Lybra Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Lancia Lybra
